channel.title: Editing max amount of players?
channel.description:
For some odd reason only 11 can get on, and it says 200 in my player.java, Is it possible that my router is limited the connections?
also, im using a linksys router.

item.title: Editing max amount of players?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Waffles!!, post:26, topic:159793”]I’m telling you Frell, if(playerAmount < 21) {
returnCode = 2;
} else {
returnCode = 7;
}[/quote]
what do the returns do?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:20, topic:159793”]On most servers its like this. So thats not a problem:

if(PlayerHandler.playerCount >= PlayerHandler.maxPlayers) {[/quote]
I want to be able to fit about 15-20 people on, but its either the server limiting it or my router.

item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Blah blah, a bunch of posts I won’t read. Suggestion for client.java:
if(playerHandler.playerAmount >= 11) {
returnCode = 2;
}
Something like that.

So more than 11 people have tried to log onto your server? Maybe they didn’t .
[/quote]
When i go eat, and come back, it will say 11 players online in cmd
and when i try to logg on it says error, it wont let that many.[/quote]

Well man i don’t know. That has never happened to me.

I’m guessing check the other login procedure. Not run method. one after that, checks banned ips, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing max amount of players?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Syrillia, post:3, topic:159793”]In the bottom of your server.java, there is this;

	public static int MaxConnections = 100000;

Maybe that’s been changed. BTW, I need help on the old jordiescape source (originally frellscape). It’s a PKing bug that crashed server everytime someone dies via PKing. Since it was originally frellscape, I was hoping you’d come across the problem before.[/quote]
Not a clue sorry, and my connections are set at 10000

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:4, topic:159793”][quote author=Syrillia link=topic=217549.msg1892544#msg1892544 date=1195793158]
In the bottom of your server.java, there is this;

	public static int MaxConnections = 100000;

Maybe that’s been changed. BTW, I need help on the old jordiescape source (originally frellscape). It’s a PKing bug that crashed server everytime someone dies via PKing. Since it was originally frellscape, I was hoping you’d come across the problem before.
[/quote]

Wrong.

Its playerHandler.java

public static final int maxPlayers = 512;

It won’t say 512, but change the number to the amount of players you want on your server.[/quote]
Its at 200 =\

Read full topic

Maybe that’s been changed. BTW, I need help on the old jordiescape source (originally frellscape). It’s a PKing bug that crashed server everytime someone dies via PKing. Since it was originally frellscape, I was hoping you’d come across the problem before.[/quote]

It won’t say 512, but change the number to the amount of players you want on your server.
